WIDTH=16;
DEPTH=10;
ADDRESS_RADIX=HEX;
DATA_RADIX=BIN;
CONTENT BEGIN
00 : 1000000000000000;                -- memory address : data
01 : 1100000000000000;
02 : 1111000000000000;
03 : 0000000000000000;
04 : 0000110000000000;
05 : 1111111111111111;
06 : 1001001000000000;
07 : 1001010100000000;
08 : 1001100000000000;
09 : 1001101100000000;
	 
END;
